function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of access to clean water and proper sanitation leading to increased risk of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Higher rates of infection and transmission of contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Improving access to clean water and proper sanitation facilities.","Technologies":"Water purification systems, sanitation infrastructure.","People":"Global population without access to clean water and sanitation facilities.","Owner":"Governments, public health organizations, NGOs."},{"Description":"Delay in developing an effective vaccine for COVID-19.","Impact":"Prolonged spread and transmission of COVID-19.","Mitigation":"Accelerating the development and production of an effective vaccine.","Technologies":"Vaccine research and development, biotechnology.","People":"Population at risk of COVID-19 infection.","Owner":"Pharmaceutical companies, research institutions, governments."},{"Description":"Inadequate access to mobile and smart phones, particularly in lower-and middle-income populations and certain regions.","Impact":"Limited effectiveness of communication technology in reaching and identifying populations.","Mitigation":"Improving access to mobile and smart phones, addressing gaps in digital connectivity.","Technologies":"Mobile network infrastructure, digital inclusion initiatives.","People":"Lower-and middle-income populations, rural communities, gender-specific usage gaps.","Owner":"Telecommunication companies, governments, NGOs."}]}
